member.name: SYSTEM_EVENT_DATA
member.summary: Contains information about a tablet system event.

member.name: SYSTEM_EVENT_DATA.bModifier
member.summary: Bit values for the modifiers. Possible values include SE_MODIFIER_CTRL (the Control key was pressed), SE_MODIFIER_ALT (the Alt key was pressed), and SE_MODIFIER_SHIFT (the Shift key was pressed).

member.name: SYSTEM_EVENT_DATA.wKey
member.summary: Scan code for the keyboard character.

member.name: SYSTEM_EVENT_DATA.bCursorMode
member.summary: The type of cursor that caused the event. Possible values include SE_NORMAL_CURSOR (the pen tip) and SE_ERASER_CURSOR (the eraser).

member.name: SYSTEM_EVENT_DATA.dwButtonState
member.summary: State of the buttons at the time of the system event.
